document.full_text: the u.s. manufacturing sector grew at a marginally slower pace in march although a measure of prices rose to their highest level since july 2008, according to an industry report released on friday.
document.title: manufacturing growth slows, prices jump
lines_and_colors: the u.s. manufacturing sector grew at a marginally slower pace in march although a measure of prices rose to their highest level since july 2008, according to an industry report released on friday.
